dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so I bet you packed an umbrella for your trip to Almaty this week.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so I bet you packed an umbrella for your trip to Almaty this week.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, you know it! I saw that thunderstorms are expected on June 11th, so I'm definitely not taking any chances.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, you know it! I saw that thunderstorms are expected on June eleventh, so I'm definitely not taking any chances.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 11: Brief rain and thunderstorms will continue.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and the winds are supposed to be pretty strong too, like, up to 14 meters per second in some places. That's no joke!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and the winds are supposed to be pretty strong too, like, up to fourteen meters per second in some places. That's no joke!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Winds from the southwest will blow at 3"8 m/s, with gusts up to 15 m/s during storms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, but at least the temperatures are staying warm— like up to 30 degrees during the day. So even with the rain, it won't be chilly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, but at least the temperatures are staying warm- like up to thirty degrees during the day. So even with the rain, it won't be chilly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The temperature will range from +18¦+20ÂC at night to +31¦+33ÂC in the afternoon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: True, but I'd still rather have that dry, calm weather they're predicting for June 10th. Partly cloudy, no rain… sounds perfect.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, but I'd still rather have that dry, calm weather they're predicting for June tenth. Partly cloudy, no rain... sounds perfect.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh, but then it's back to thunder and showers after that. It's all over the place!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh, but then it's back to thunder and showers after that. It's all over the place!

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And did you see the part about Minister Yerlan Nyssanbayev's summer forecast? Some areas might hit 45 degrees later!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And did you see the part about Minister Yerlan Nyssanbayev's summer forecast? Some areas might hit forty five degrees later!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In some parts of the southwest, temperatures could reach 45ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, forty five? That is intense.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but at least rainfall is supposed to be around normal for June and July— except maybe a bit more up north.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but at least rainfall is supposed to be around normal for June and July- except maybe a bit more up north.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rainfall in June and July is expected to be within normal levels, though the north, south, and southeast may receive slightly more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Still, I'm just glad Almaty stabilizes by June 12th. Warm and dry to finish the week? I can handle that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, I'm just glad Almaty stabilizes by June twelfth. Warm and dry to finish the week? I can handle that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 12: Partly cloudy skies are expected with no precipitation. The weather will stabilize midweek, bringing warm and dry conditions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. But honestly, with weather this unpredictable, maybe we should just expect surprises.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. But honestly, with weather this unpredictable, maybe we should just expect surprises.
